heading: Perceived Fairness of EU Actions Towards a Fair Green Transition in the EU
subheading: 88% of the interviewed EU citizens totally agree that the green transition should not leave anyone behind and 50% think the EU is acting adequatly
tooltip1: perceive the measures towards the green transition as fair
textNote: 26.395 EU citizens were interviewed from 30.05.2022 to 28.06.2022
